s: This was the first time I had tasted this brand of sparkling juice. The ones I tried before were just flat and tasteless, but I really like both the Clementine and Pomegranate flavors of this, refreshing and good tasting and no strange ingredients - haven't had a chance to try the other flavors yet, but I'll definitely be buying more IZZE ...
